title: Tahm Kench, the River King, available now

replies.body: All {{champion:245}} needs is seconds, but Tahm needs thirds, and fourths, and fifths, and...
He was released right on Tahm!
Kench you not please?
Reading both puns in Tahm's voice really brings out the flavor in them.
i find the chef skin fits very well, he could make a great stew with some salt, basil, and just a pinch of tahm.
Master Chef Tahm is the new  Gordon Ramsay

Hell,

(•_•) 
( •_•)>⌐■-■
(⌐■_■)

It's about damn Tahm.

In honor of the new re releases of Star Wars let there be Tahm the Hutt skin! Complete with chosen{{champion:11}}  and wookie {{champion:106}} ewok{{champion:17}} darth {{champion:45}}  ?? I'm sure George Lucas won't mind
For some reason i want {{champion:432}} to be the wookie...
DARTH VAGER{{champion:45}}
I wonder what its like to cook food in the KENCH-EN
If you were born or live in Louisiana and you don't get this champ and skin... SHAME ON YOU!!!

Southerners in general I'd expect. 

Kentuckians For Tahm, baby!
Now all we need is a Taxicab Driver Tahm skin and we're set! {{summoner:6}}
Real talk. Riot. Remove Master Chef skin and rerelease it as a Legendary Skin voiced by Gordon Ramsay
Too many F bombs for League. It would bump them up from T rating lol.
{{champion:223}} has come to devour us all? {{champion:31}} Has something to say about that!
hey everyone, look!, it's Fizz'z DAD
Where is the mother??{{champion:267}} {{champion:267}}

Ermm... I don't think fizz is a yordle, it's like saying Annie is a yordle, which she is not, she is just naturally short. Same as a fish, u don't expect a fish with a trident to be 7 feet tall? O well
well annie is a kid tho so thats why she is short
I wonder if tahm jungle is going to work
nightblue3 did it multiple times and i would say it works pretty well
To be fair Nightblue3 plays every newly released champion in the jungle :/ {{champion:432}} {{item:1039}}

I think it'll work alright... he may not be as valuable in the jungle as a Gragas or a Sej pre-6, but as long as the laner has a little lockdown so that Tahm can get the 3 stacks in he seems to gank fairly well. I know I'm looking to give it a few tries.
SUSHI CHEF {{champion:98}} PLZ

I'm sorry, but it has to be said.
I'm going to be doing TONGUES of Damage!
Taken. Preak already announced that pun during the spotlight. :/

I know :P
He's awesome.

Like if you like/love Tahm Kench's login music.
Dislike if you hate/dislike/or think it's kind of meh.
How much does he cost in IP?
7800 for his first week of release and then 6300 after that.

why did riot make his bundle cost 1462 I legit just bought a 10 dollar one because I always see the bundles costing 1350 but no it had to be reasonably a bit more than 1350 so u either buy 15 or 20 card and apart from 1350 I only have 52 rp{{item:3070}}
Bundles have always been 1462. Not once have it ever been 1350.
Make it so that whenever gromp the champion eats a yordle and they die while in his mouth he swallows them whole
is it me or will this guy be played by A LOT of trolls? just look at his ability's!
Ability* Only his eat thing could be abused. The ultimate shows where he is going before people jump in.
You can choose to leave his mouth though pretty fast
It literally pings where he is planning to go. If you're careless enough to not look at the map, then you deserve to take an "Abyssal Voyage" to the fountain.
Why so many support and mage champions riot, where the fighters?
{{champion:421}} Did you forget about me?
{{champion:150}} too, but a bit earlier.
{{champion:245}} 's not a mage, either...
Who would win in a pie eating contest Tahm, Gragas or Cho' Gath?
{{champion:223}} , duh. He'd eat the other two.
wut bout {{champion:31}} 6 stacks?
